architectural_notes: Constrain the 'No' button's random movement to a safe viewport area by clamping positions using current viewport dimensions minus the button's rendered width/height, ensuring it remains fully visible/clickable at all times.
known_issues: Bug: 'No' button can move partially/fully off-screen; random positioning does not account for viewport bounds and button dimensions.

existing_features.title: Fix the Valentine Opening Screen “No” button movement so the button’s rendered bounding box always remains completely within the visible viewport (no partial off-screen placement). Random repositioning must be strictly constrained within the viewport boundaries and must properly account for the button’s current width/height and dynamic viewport changes (resize/orientation/zoom/mobile browser UI). The button must remain fully visible and clickable at all times while still moving playfully and randomly within the safe area. Keep everything else unchanged.

projectName: Fix “No” button to stay fully within the visible viewport at all times
